# outputFormat(forBus:)

**Instance Method**

Retrieves the output format for the bus you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func outputFormat(forBus bus: AVAudioNodeBus) -> AVAudioFormat
```

## Parameters

- **bus**: An audio node bus.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioFormat] instance that represents the output format of the bus.

## Creating an Output Format Bus

- **name(forOutputBus:)**: Retrieves the name of the output bus you specify.
- **numberOfOutputs**: The number of output busses for the node.
